It's our duty to provide better health care. Every American deserves it.

Lowering Health Care Costs

Together we can lower insurance premiums, give consumers better information to make informed health care decisions, coordinate care and spread innovation.

CMS Provides Health Coverage for 100 Million People...

...through Medicare, Medicaid, and the Children's Health Insurance Program. And with health insurance reforms and health care exchanges, we are improving health care and ensuring coverage for all Americans.

Learn more about how CMS is Implementing the Affordable Care Act
  • Information for people with Medicare, Medicare open enrollment, and benefits.
  • Information for children up to the age of 19 in need of health care coverage.
  • Information to take health care into your own hands, explore insurance coverage options and learn how the Affordable Care Act impacts you.
